name: B. Chilly Willy
statement:
Chilly Willy loves playing with numbers. He only knows prime numbers
that are digits yet. These numbers are , , and . But Willy grew rather
bored of such numbers, so he came up with a few games that were
connected with them.Chilly Willy wants to find the minimum number of
length , such that it is simultaneously divisible by all numbers Willy
already knows (, , and ). Help him with that.A number’s length is the
number of digits in its decimal representation without leading zeros.
